data.eml:eml: A new species of Acaudaleyrodes Takahashi (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Iran, with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Manzari, Shahab, Alemansoor, Hassan (2005): A new species of Acaudaleyrodes Takahashi (Hemiptera: Aleyrodidae) from Iran, with a key to the species of the genus. Zootaxa 829: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170652
